an8.86:5.1: ekaccā nayimassa → ekaccā imassa (?), assu → idaṃ padaṃ katthaci, akicchalābhiniyo → nikāmalābhiniyo akicchalābhiniyo (?)
an8.86:5.2: Tumhākampi → tāsampi (?), anuyuttānaṃ viharataṃ → anuyutte viharante disvā (?)
an8.86:5.3: na hi nūname → naha nūna me (bj, s1-3, pts1), assu → idaṃ padaṃ katthaci
an8.86:8.3: imaṃ → idānimaṃ (katthaci), upaṭṭhahissati → paccessati (bj) | saccessati (pts1) | upaṭṭhahati (mr), Taṃ tamhā → so taṃ tamhā (?)
